item.description:
1. As opposed to a normal meeting, we’ll be hosting an all-Rotaract Social with the Boston area Rotaract Clubs including Boston Univeristy School of Public Health Rotaract Club, Boston University Rotaract Club, and the Cambridge Rotaract Club. There will be food and beverages available. We will be collecting donations for the Victim Rights Law Center, and our very own Justine Grosso will be giving a presentation on resume-building. The event has been posted on Facebook and invites have been sent out. If you’d like to help with the planning/have ideas for programming, please contact rotaryliaison@bostonrotaract.org.
    1. See the event flyer here: http://goo.gl/qOCx1
    2. Here’s the link for the Facebook event page: http://goo.gl/tKyFR
    3. All! If you would like to donate online, please see the link below: http://goo.gl/Iu5Po; you could also write a check made payable to Boston Rotaract or give cash. REMEMBER, WE ARE DOING A RAFFLE! YOU ARE ONLY ELIGIBLE FOR THE RAFFLE IF YOU HAVE DONATED! Thanks and I hope to see you all there!
    4. If you are attending the social, please make sure to bring a copy of your resume!!
item.how_to_find_us: Walk into 116 Beacon, down the hall & take the stairs on the left going down. Follow the signs for Boston Rotaract to the Trustee's Reading Room (TRR)!

group.name: Boston Rotaract - A Service/Social Club for 18-30 Yr Olds

item.name: Boston Rotaract Speaker and General Meeting
